snippet: Mr. Archilla and his partner, Elmer Lokkins, lived together in Manhattan for 58 years before eloping to Canada in 2003 and coming out publicly.
abstract: Gustavo Archilla, whose marriage in Canada in 2003 after almost six decades of a quiet and committed relationship with partner Elmer Lokkins inspired supporters of same-sex marriage, dies at age 96.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Archilla and his partner, Elmer Lokkins, lived together in Manhattan for 58 years before eloping to Canada in 2003 and coming out publicly.

headline.seo: Gustavo Archilla, Whose Wedding Inspired Gay-Marriage Advocates, Dies at 96
headline.main: Gustavo Archilla, an Inspiration for Gay Marriage, Dies at 96
headline.print_headline: Gustavo Archilla, 96, an Inspiration for Gay Marriage, Dies

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
